name: Subak Hwachae: Korean Watermelon Punch
description: Korean watermelon punch is a typical Korean fruit punch to enjoy in the summer.

name: Hotteok: Korean Sweet Pancake
description: A coiled pastry filled with almond paste and flavored with orange blossom water.

name: Patbingsu: Korean Shaved Milky Ice
description: A traditional Korean dessert combined milky shaved ice with red beans, rice cakes and a drizzle of sweet condensed milk for an authentic and delicious Korean dessert.

name: Yakshik: Korean Sweet Rice with Dried Fruit and Nuts
description: A traditional Korean dessert made with sticky rice, jujube, chestnut, and other nuts.

name: Goguma Mattang: Chunchy Korean Candied Sweet Potato
description: Goguma mattang is Korean candied sweet potato covered in a hard caramelized sugar candy. It has a crunchy outside and a soft, fluffy inside, making it an ideal sweet snack for fall and winter.
